review: This is an amazing piece of equipment.  I was looking for a way to reduce my cable bill and was torn between all the available options out there.  When I finally came upon the Fire TV, it pretty much had everything I was looking for.  It combined all the things of the Chromecast and Roku, plus all the benefits of Amazon and Prime.  I was able to drop a huge portion of my Comcast (and we all know how great it is to get rid of as much Comcast as possible!) ans save quite a bit of money.  I especially like that Amazon left the Fire TV "unlocked" so then I can install non-official apps.  I think this might be the best thing I've bought from Amazon so far and I highly recommend it...for $100 it seems like a no-brainer.
author: Thomas Rosswaag
